Package fr.zinraphil.models.geometry

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.Shape<Polygon>
fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.Polygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable, IAxialSymmetry, ICentralSymmetry, IHomothethy, IRotation, ITranslation, Comparable<Shape>
public class Polygon extends Shape<Polygon> implements IRotation, ITranslation, ICentralSymmetry, IDrawable, IHomothethy, IAxialSymmetry
Represents a polygon on a two-dimensional plane.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Shape o)
      Compares this polygon to another shape object. If the object is not a polygon, it is considered less than this polygon. If the object is a polygon, the two polygons are compared based on the number of points they have in common. If the number of points in common is equal, the polygons are considered equal.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Shape>
      Parameters:
      o - the shape object to compare to this polygon
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this polygon is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object
